code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'../styles/patientsList.css';import'../styles/therapistSessionNotes.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function TherapistSessionNotes(){const[patients,setPatients]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const fetchPatients=async()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const{data}=await axios.get('/api/therapist/patients',{headers:{'x-auth-token':token}});setPatients(data);setLoading(false);};fetchPatients();},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Cargando pacientes\u2026"});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"therapist-session-notes-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"patients-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/therapist",className:"back-link",children:"\u2190 Volver"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Selecciona Paciente para Notas"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"patients-grid",children:patients.map(p=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:`/therapist/session-notes/${p._id}`,className:"patient-note-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:[p.nombre," ",p.apellidos]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("small",{children:new Date(p.fechaNacimiento).toLocaleDateString()})]},p._id))})]});}
